title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles – Dual-Sided, 17" Wooden Long Handle

Highlights
- Dual-sided bristles: soft nylon for gentle cleansing; natural stiff bristles for invigorating exfoliation.
- Use wet or dry: lather up in the shower or dry brush before bathing to boost circulation and smooth skin.
- Long reach comfort: 17-inch contoured wooden handle makes back and hard-to-reach areas easy to clean.
- Secure grip: non-slip rubber patch helps prevent slipping; hanging rope for quick drying and convenient storage.
- Durable and easy care: rinse and wash every few weeks; replace every 3–6 months to maintain hygiene and performance.

Product Description
Refresh your routine with the Metene Shower Brush featuring soft and stiff bristles on a single, dual-sided head. The soft nylon side gently cleanses and pampers sensitive skin, while the natural stiff bristle side delivers satisfying exfoliation to remove dead skin and help unclog pores. Designed for both wet and dry brushing, it’s versatile enough for your daily shower or a pre-shower dry brush session.

A 17-inch wooden handle provides comfortable reach across your back, legs, and shoulders, and the integrated non-slip rubber patch keeps your grip secure even with soapy hands. After use, hang the brush by its rope loop to air dry quickly and keep your bathroom tidy. For best results, clean the brush every few weeks and replace it every 3–6 months.

Specifications
- Product: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles
- Bristle types: Soft nylon (gentle cleanse), Natural stiff (exfoliation)
- Usage: Wet brushing and dry brushing
- Handle: 17-inch wood handle with non-slip rubber patch and hanging rope
- Dual-sided head: Yes
- Maintenance: Wash every few weeks; replace every 3–6 months
- Package contents: 1 shower brush

What’s in the Box
- 1 x Metene dual-sided shower brush.
